Hi My name is Taco Kerman i am back with another suggestion for the game!

I Proudly present

Seasons

Well yeah thats a pretty crazy idea but i find it intresting what if Kerbin had seasons , Like for example i timewarped in kerbin map view and over time Ice and snow over the poles Grow and Retract in summer , i know this idea will be extremely hard to do because changing biomes , again and again and again would take alot of programming , but meh even if it didnt happen i just wanted to share this idea mabye squad has specialists that can do it

so thats whats this all about

Thank you for reading this

i was going for like: if a plane engine runs for more than x hours, then it has a chance of failing and as the usage gets higher, the chance gets higher.
Of course, to have seasons Kerbin would need to have axial tilt - which I believe isn't possible. Other planets could manage some variation with their orbital eccentricity.
Unless seasons have weather/wind differences, I don't really see much of a point with this, and making localized seasons would be pretty hard too

On ‎9‎/‎29‎/‎2016 at 6:52 AM, tomf said:

Of course, to have seasons Kerbin would need to have axial tilt - which I believe isn't possible. Other planets could manage some variation with their orbital eccentricity.

It has been deemed impossible, but I believe I know a workaround. The axial tilt relative to the orbit of the planet is impossible correct? Then all that is needed is for Kerbin not to orbit the sun, but rather to orbit another point that is orbiting the sun. This point could be called "Kerbin Orbit" or just not show up in the map view, and Kerbin would orbit it at an imperceptibly low altitude (0.01m or something0 (or if possible, Kerbin would orbit it at 0m/s) and at the inclination of the desired axial tilt. The SOI of the point would be so tiny that it is inside the core of Kerbin, so nobody would ever encounter it, only Kerbin's SOI. Same workaround could work for other planets.

And also didn't (doesn't) one of the planet mods have axial tilt on one/more of its planets? If so Squad just needs to do whatever that mod does (maybe even hire that modder?)
